entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the river early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
